bug.author: dsmilkov
bug.summary: Packed broadcast gives different result than unpacked broadcast
bug.description:
Relevant PR that introduced this bug: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-core/pull/1706>tensorflow/tfjs-core#1706</denchmark-link>
To reproduce, yalc link core@master and run the tfjs-layers test. 1 test fails.

comments.comment: Keeping the issue open so we remember to try to figure out how to create a test case (note this error only occurs on Linux and has to do with how unused channels are handled).
Fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-core/pull/1721>tensorflow/tfjs-core#1721</denchmark-link> . Closing since there is a test in layers that catches this issue.
